on reading compounds: ８月【ハチガツ】August, eighth month of the lunar calendar
尺八【シャクハチ】shakuhachi, end-blown fippleless bamboo flute, blow job, fellatio
kun reading compounds: 八つ当たり【やつあたり】venting one's anger (on someone or something), taking out one's anger on
八日【ようか】the eighth day of the month, eight days
